name: Sorting documents by default option with grouping
scenarioId: android/New_version_of_the_wallet_UI_UX_2/Filter_and_Sort_Documents_Redesign_116/filterAndSortDocuments:Sorting documents by default option with grouping
methodName: Sorting documents by default option with grouping

testSteps.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is on the Documents screen
Given the user has opened the filter or sort bottom sheet
When the user selects to sort by Default or Category
And the user taps the Apply button
Then the documents list should be grouped by category
And within each category, the documents should be ordered by attestation name in ascending order

userStory.storyName: Filtering and sorting documents in the EUDI Wallet
userStory.displayName: Filtering and sorting documents in the EUDI Wallet
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to filter and sort the documents in EUDI Wallet
  So that I can find and view the documents according to my needs

title: Sorting documents by default option with grouping
